Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: He said, I'll love you till I die.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Dear George, I was sitting in my office the other day, and I was thinking about the days

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: that had gone by, and remembering the good times you and I had had, and trying to avoid

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: the bad.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Over and over again, I kept wondering what would life be like should the Lord come today

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: and take my good friend George Jones off into the night.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: I kept telling myself why it couldn't be, but knowing all along that it is surely sooner

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: than I would believe.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: So I wrote a last message to my good buddy George, and it's one that I think you ought

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: to listen to, one that you sure need to hear.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: It goes something like this.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Many of us go to life worrying and fretting because we don't have regular bowel movements.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: The most important thing to remember about a normal bowel is that your own pattern is

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: normal for you.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Some people have bowel action after every meal.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Some have it as rarely as once a week.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Lack of daily bowel action does not harm your health.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: It does not cause pimples, acne, or other facial blemishes.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: It does not cause cancer, or growths in the intestines, nor any other disease.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Your bowel will move when it's ready to.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: It's so hard watching you, for I really like to see you stick around a while.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Can you hear me George?

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Can you hear me?

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Don't leave me, cause I sure love you George.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: This is your old friend Roy.
